alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 11:56PM CDT until June 01 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Southeastern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Medicine Mound, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chillicothe, Fargo, Medicine Mound and Lockett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
